message: Veto that bill
So cute and tougher than most men. We need a whole generation of mini-super heros like this.

For those of you saying that 10% tip is appropriate, please stop going to restaurants. You're cheap....point blank. Wait staff in most states make between $2.50-5.00 per hour plus tips. And , you're an elitist dick. Not everyone has the ability or opportunity to get a better job.
Plus they just released that dope coil-less pen. Fuckin awesome.

Thank You All Who Make A Stand. They have the right to not stand but they don't have the right to call themselves Americans!! They are scumbags if they try and call themselves Americans. I bet they were draft dodgers too. I am currently serving my country in the worlds greatest Navy! Why? Because I love this country and I would die for my country! And yes I will fight for turds like that to have the right to choose to sit during the pledge of allegiance because this is still a free country like it or not. GOD BLESS AMERICA!! and God Bless all of you who support our military and this country

Sheila, I know that folks are slamming your response, but I wanted to say thanks for having the courage to write it... i found it very matter of fact, and quite thought-provoking. You raised some great points!
If she offered to leave her stuff, I'd let her leave. she obviously would come back. Otherwise, i understand. sure we all leave stuff, but tons of people also steal. All.the. time.
